txt.en:
'I see that you have recently gained access to the Metalsmith's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of Crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their craft. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Metalsmith's Guild. The leader can be found in Ered Luin, near the craft area in Thorin's Hall.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Metalsmith's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of Crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their craft. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Metalsmith's Guild. The leader can be found in Ered Luin, near the craft area in Thorin's Hall.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
Introduction: Metalsmith's Guild

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Metalsmith's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of Crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their craft. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Metalsmith's Guild. The leader can be found in Ered Luin, near the craft area in Thorin's Hall.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Metalsmith's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of Crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their craft. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Metalsmith's Guild. The leader can be found in Ered Luin, near the craft area in Thorin's Hall.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
The Guild-leader offers you reputation in exchange for crafted items
'You should speak with the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild immediately!'

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Metalsmith's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of Crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their craft. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Metalsmith's Guild. The leader can be found in Ered Luin, near the craft area in Thorin's Hall.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
Reifnir offers many important recipes
'You should speak with the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild immediately!'

'Welcome to the Metalsmith's Guild! This is an excellent faction for metalsmiths who are looking to benefit from their expertise.

'As the leader of this faction, it is my role to oversee the advancement of your reputation as you trade your items in. I will gladly collect everything you make from our own Guild-recipes!

'To collect the recipes to make the items I seek, you should speak with Reifnir, then with Lar. They will help you to get started.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The role of the Guild-leader is to trade crafted, barterable items in exchange for reputation with the Guild.</rgb>
Lar offers advantageous rewards for members of the Metalsmith's Guild
Hávar, the Metalsmith's Guild-leader, is in the Guild-hall in Thorin's Hall.\n\nThe Master of Crafting Guilds has instructed you to speak with Hávar to learn more about the Metalsmith's Guild.
'You should speak with the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild immediately!'

'You will notice that I have many new recipes for sale. As your crafting ability increases, more recipes will become available, so check back with me often!

'The crests are made from the recipes I sell; those items are the ones you may give to Hávar in exchange for reputation. This is the only way to gain reputation. It's best to start early!'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: This recipe vendor sells the recipes that let you create unique barter items. The output items are traded for reputation with the Guild.</rgb>
Reifnir is in the Metalsmith's Guild-hall in Thorin's Hall.\n\nHávar has directed you to speak with Reifnir to look at what recipes he sells.
'You should speak with the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild immediately!'

'I'm the vendor you should come to when you're ready to reap your rewards. I might not have anything you can use just yet, but my recipes will be available once you advance your reputation with us!

'The goods that you can make from my recipes are far superior to any other recipe you find and will guarantee the utmost success in crafting. Make sure you come back again once you reach Acquaintance level with the Metalsmith's Guild!'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The improved recipes sold at this vendor are the rewards for gaining reputation with the Guild.</rgb>
Lar is in the Metalsmith's Guild-hall in Thorin's Hall.\n\nHávar has directed you to speak with Lar to look at what recipes he sells.
'You should speak with the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild immediately!'
'You should speak with the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild immediately!'
'You should speak with Reifnir at once.'
'You should speak at once with Lar.'
Talk to Hávar, the Metalsmith's Guild-leader
Talk to the vendor who sells crest recipes
Talk to the vendor who sells improved recipes
The Metalsmith's Guild is a society for the finest metalsmiths throughout Middle-earth.

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Metalsmith's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of Crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their craft. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Metalsmith's Guild. The leader can be found in Ered Luin, near the craft area in Thorin's Hall.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
